article_title: Burton, Willis gaining speed but also veering wildly as Senate race nears finish
article_text:
Bud Kennedy is a homegrown Fort Worth guy who started out covering high school football here when he was 16. He went away to the Fort Worth Press and newspapers in Austin and Dallas, then came home in 1981.

Since 1987, he's written more than 1,000 weekly dining columns and more than 3,000 news and politics columns. If you don't like what he says about politics, read him on barbecue.

Email Bud at bud@star-telegram.com

Bud Kennedy is a homegrown Fort Worth guy who started out covering high school football here when he was 16.
He went away to the Fort Worth Press and newspapers in Austin and Dallas, then came home in 1981.
Since 1987, he's written more than 1,000 weekly dining columns and more than 3,000 news and politics columns.
If you don't like what he says about politics, read him on barbecue.
